description: Sheffield Wednesday sign Preston defender Bambo Diaby and Monaco forward Anthony Musaba for undisclosed fees.
title: Bambo Diaby & Anthony Musaba: Sheffield Wednesday sign defender and forward
title_page: Bambo Diaby & Anthony Musaba: Sheffield Wednesday sign defender and forward - BBC Sport
maintext:
Sheffield Wednesday have signed Preston defender Bambo Diaby and Monaco forward Anthony Musaba for undisclosed fees.
Diaby, 25, made his senior debut for Spanish side UE Cornella and has had spells with Sampdoria, Girona, Lokeren and Barnsley.
Musaba, 22, is a former Netherlands Under-21 international.
"Bambo is a big, strong centre-back. He is very quick with the positions in defence," Owls boss Xisco Munoz said., external
"He has a very good mentality, he will always make sacrifices for the good of the group and he will bring a lot of balance to the squad."
Munoz added: "Anthony has big capacity with a lot of ability one against one and he is a player who learns and will give everything.
"He has a lot of pace, he is a good crosser of the ball and I think he will be a very good player for us."
The Owls have not disclosed the length of contract the two players have signed.
